integrations.name: Claude Code CLI Integration
integrations.description: Primary AI agent execution environment for Manager and Worker processes
integrations.purpose: Provides Claude AI reasoning capabilities for code generation and analysis
integrations.error_handling: Process restart on crash, context rotation at 60%

integrations.name: Node.js Runtime
integrations.description: Server runtime for Watcher service and WebSocket bridge
integrations.purpose: Hosts Express.js server and Socket.io for real-time dashboard updates
integrations.error_handling: Graceful shutdown, automatic restart via process manager

integrations.name: Socket.io WebSocket Library
integrations.description: Real-time bidirectional communication between Watcher and Dashboard
integrations.purpose: Push telemetry and progress updates to browser clients in real-time

integrations.name: Express.js Web Framework
integrations.description: HTTP server for static file serving and API endpoints
integrations.purpose: Serve HTML dashboard and handle Crisis Mode API

integrations.name: TypeScript Compiler (tsc)
integrations.description: Static type checking and compilation for back pressure enforcement
integrations.purpose: Verify type safety before code commit as guardrail check
integrations.error_handling: Block commit on error, capture output to LAST_COMPILER_ERROR.log

integrations.name: Vitest/Jest Test Runner
integrations.description: Unit test framework for code verification
integrations.purpose: Execute test suites as part of Ralph Wiggum Loop
integrations.error_handling: Block commit on test failure, capture output for Worker analysis

integrations.name: Git Version Control
integrations.purpose: Track changes, enable Crisis Mode revert, preserve history for ADR
integrations.error_handling: Preserve history on all operations, clean working directory on crisis

integrations.name: RipGrep (rg)
integrations.description: Fast regex-based code search for pattern analysis and auditing
integrations.purpose: Distiller pattern analysis, KreativReason standards enforcement, PIN navigation
integrations.error_handling: Continue with available results on partial failure

integrations.name: Prisma ORM
integrations.purpose: Database operations with mandatory tenantId for all queries
integrations.error_handling: Block deploy if tenantId missing in any query

integrations.name: Zod Schema Validation
integrations.description: Runtime schema validation for API inputs
integrations.purpose: Validate all API endpoint inputs as guardrail requirement
integrations.error_handling: Return 400 on validation failure, log for audit

integrations.name: Filesystem API
integrations.purpose: Read/write markdown state files, telemetry, and logs
integrations.error_handling: Retry on EBUSY, create directories on ENOENT

integrations.name: Process Management (Bash)
integrations.description: Bash scripts for process lifecycle management
integrations.purpose: orchestrate.sh manages Manager/Worker spawning and rotation
integrations.error_handling: pkill on crisis, retry with delay on crash
